value_claims.claim_description: Under Armour built the world's largest digital health and fitness community with more than 160 million members through its Connected Fitness platform and suite of applications.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: The Connected Fitness platform directly uses AI/data analytics to power the community experience, track user data, and provide personalized insights across UA Record, MapMyFitness, Endomondo and MyFitnessPal apps.

value_claims.claim_title: Personalized coaching improves runner performance and engagement
value_claims.claim_description: MapMyRun app with connected HOVR shoes provides personalized coaching using running data (pace, cadence, stride length), helping runners improve performance and motivating users to log more workouts and get faster.
value_claims.source_quote: The new MapMyRun technology in all connected HOVR shoes is shown to actually help runners get better...users are motivated to log more workouts and get faster.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: AI-powered analytics directly analyze running metrics to deliver personalized coaching recommendations, demonstrating predictive and prescriptive capabilities that drive behavior change and performance improvement.

value_claims.claim_title: Holistic health view through four-pillar data integration
value_claims.claim_description: UA Record provides holistic health view integrating data from four quadrants (SLEEP, FITNESS, ACTIVITY, NUTRITION) through single-view dashboard with insights and new 'How do you feel?' metric.
value_claims.source_quote: UA Record now provides a holistic view of your health based on four quadrants - SLEEP, FITNESS, ACTIVITY and NUTRITION - through an intuitive single-view dashboard.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: AI analytics directly aggregate and synthesize multi-source health data to generate insights and calculate personalized metrics, demonstrating diagnostic and predictive cognitive capabilities.

value_claims.claim_title: Real-time coaching and feedback during runs
value_claims.claim_description: MapMyRun app provides real-time coaching and feedback for runners, with audio coaching delivered through UA True Wireless Flash headphones, enabling phone-free running with Galaxy Watch integration.
value_claims.source_quote: the UA MapMyRun app can be used to provide real-time coaching and feedback for runners...relay audio coaching feedback directly in the ear.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: AI algorithms directly analyze real-time running data to generate prescriptive coaching recommendations delivered in-the-moment, demonstrating autonomous feedback capabilities.

value_claims.claim_title: Advanced running metrics and form analysis
value_claims.claim_description: UA HOVR Connected footwear provides in-depth running form analysis and advanced metrics (cadence, stride length, distance, pace) with post-run coaching, automatically pairing with devices.
value_claims.source_quote: UA HOVR Connected footwear gives runners an in-depth analysis of their running form and advanced running metrics to monitor their performance.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: AI-powered analytics directly process sensor data from connected shoes to generate diagnostic insights about running form and prescriptive coaching recommendations.

value_claims.claim_description: Under Armour Connected Fitness API/SDK platform operates as open platform with more than 400 partner apps and devices, enabling ecosystem expansion and data interoperability.
value_claims.source_quote: UA Record is powered by the Under Armour Connected Fitness™ API/SDK platform (developer.underarmour.com), an open platform with more than 400 partner apps and devices.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: The API/SDK platform enables AI-powered data integration and analytics across partner ecosystem, though partners contribute to the overall value creation beyond just UA's AI capabilities.

value_claims.claim_description: UA SpeedForm Gemini 2 Record Equipped smart shoe tracks and stores running data (time, date, duration, distance, splits) enabling untethered, device-free running experience.
value_claims.source_quote: Under Armour's first smart shoe tracks and stores data including time and date, duration, distance, and splits. This cutting-edge footwear provides an untethered running experience.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Embedded sensors and AI analytics directly enable autonomous data capture and storage in footwear, creating new capability for phone-free tracking.

value_claims.claim_description: Under Armour ecosystem creates lock-in effects through integrated services (membership rewards, connected products, apps, gyms) that drive innovation flywheel and enable needs identification.
value_claims.source_quote: This holistic and human-centered approach and focus to customer experience creates lock-in effects that in turn drive the innovation flywheel.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: AI-powered data analytics contribute to understanding customer needs and personalizing experiences, but lock-in effects result from broader ecosystem design including non-AI elements.

context_claims.claim_title: Connected Fitness product launch at CES 2016
context_claims.claim_description: Under Armour unveiled its first-ever Connected Fitness product portfolio including UA HealthBox, smart shoes, and wireless headphones at Consumer Electronics Show in Las Vegas on January 5, 2016.
context_claims.source_quote: Today, Under Armour (NYSE: UA) unveiled the brand's first-ever Connected Fitness product portfolio...at the Consumer Electronics Show in Las Vegas.

context_claims.claim_title: Under Armour as performance apparel company
context_claims.claim_description: Under Armour is the originator of performance footwear, apparel and equipment, founded 20 years prior to 2016, with global headquarters in Baltimore, Maryland.
context_claims.source_quote: For 20 years, Under Armour has changed the way athletes dress and now we will change the way athletes live

context_claims.claim_title: Transform from apparel to lifestyle platform
context_claims.claim_description: Under Armour's strategic intent is to transform from changing how athletes dress to changing how athletes live through Connected Fitness ecosystem and holistic health data platform.
context_claims.source_quote: For 20 years, Under Armour has changed the way athletes dress and now we will change the way athletes live

context_claims.claim_description: Under Armour operates in the health and fitness technology sector, positioning itself as provider of the world's largest digital health and fitness community platform.
context_claims.source_quote: The Under Armour Connected Fitness™ platform powers the world's largest digital health and fitness community

context_claims.claim_title: Strategic partnerships with HTC and HARMAN
context_claims.claim_description: Under Armour formed strategic partnerships with HTC for engineering UA HealthBox system and HARMAN for developing sport headphones, announced at CES 2016.
context_claims.source_quote: Under Armour is also announcing strategic partnerships with two leading global brands: HTC and HARMAN International Industries

context_claims.claim_description: Product portfolio includes UA HealthBox system ($400), UA Band ($180), UA Heart Rate ($80), UA Scale ($180), smart shoes ($150), and wireless headphones ($180-$250).
context_claims.source_quote: The Under Armour Connected Products portfolio includes: UA HealthBox™...UA Band™...UA Heart Rate™...UA Scale™...UA SpeedForm® Gemini 2 Record Equipped

context_claims.claim_description: In 2019, Under Armour expanded its runner ecosystem with Samsung Galaxy Watch integration, new HOVR footwear, and UA True Wireless Flash headphones with JBL partnership.
context_claims.source_quote: In 2019, Under Armour is committed to helping runners reach their goals by developing cutting-edge products to enhance the running experience.

context_claims.claim_description: Under Armour partnered with Samsung for Galaxy Watch integration and JBL for audio engineering, creating seamless ecosystem for runners announced in 2019.
context_claims.source_quote: Under Armour is excited to continue elevating our partnerships with world-class technology and experience experts Samsung and JBL

context_claims.claim_description: Under Armour operates digital marketing and customer engagement functions through apps, membership programs, and direct-to-consumer channels including e-commerce and physical stores.
context_claims.source_quote: Under Armour's main source of revenue is generated from their Direct-to-customer (DTC) and retail business...This includes e-commerce via the Under Armour app
context_claims.apqc_name: Market and Sell Products and Services

context_claims.claim_description: Under Armour develops connected products integrating hardware (shoes, wearables) with software (apps, analytics) to create integrated health and fitness solutions.
context_claims.source_quote: we've developed products that are easy to use together and also provide a premium run experience that naturally integrate sound and data
context_claims.apqc_name: Develop and Manage Products and Services

context_claims.claim_description: Under Armour operates globally with products sold in U.S. department stores, specialty sporting goods stores, off-price retail locations, and mom-and-pop businesses.
context_claims.source_quote: Under Armour's merchandise is sold in a number of U.S. department stores, specialty sporting goods stores and off-price retail locations

context_claims.claim_description: Connected Fitness platform comprises suite of applications including UA Record, MapMyFitness, MapMyRun, Endomondo, and MyFitnessPal serving different fitness tracking needs.
context_claims.source_quote: The Under Armour Connected Fitness™ platform powers the world's largest digital health and fitness community through a suite of applications: UA Record, MapMyFitness, Endomondo and MyFitnessPal.

context_claims.claim_description: Strategic focus on capturing holistic health data across four pillars (sleep, fitness, activity, nutrition) to provide comprehensive view beyond just workout data.
context_claims.source_quote: what can be accomplished during your workouts can easily be undone in everyday life. The future of health and fitness is a holistic view of data from these four core health and fitness pillars

context_claims.claim_description: Under Armour has Chief Digital Officer (Robin Thurston) and SVP Global Consumer Engagement and Digital (Jim Mollica) roles leading Connected Fitness strategy.
context_claims.source_quote: said Robin Thurston, Chief Digital Officer, Under Armour...said Jim Mollica, SVP Global Consumer Engagement and Digital at Under Armour
